about_the_game:
Hunting can be many different things to many different people. For some, it's a hobby, for others it's a passion, and for the rare few, it's a lifestyle. Remi Warren is one such person, and we've had the pleasure of collaborating with him for theHunter: Call of the Wild. That is why we are introducing the Remi Warren Hunter free DLC.

WHO IS REMI WARREN


Remi Warren is a well-known writer, outfitter, television host, conservationist, and die-hard hunter who averages nearly 300 days a year in the wild. From a very young age, he was wandering the mountainsides, learning about the land and the animals that dwell there. He has hunted for most of his life and loves to share that knowledge and adventuring with others. 

PLAY AS REMI WARREN


In the Remi Warren Hunter DLC, you will be able to choose Remi as your playable hunter, heading out into the wild in his most recognizable Under Armour Infil Windstopper Kit. Venture to an outpost or tent to change your appearance whenever it suits you, and decide whether to try and replicate some of his more famous hunting moments or simply go out on your own is entirely up to you. So head out into the wild, and seize your inner Warren.
